unnormalised: Arrey yaar, remember back in '01 when the census showed Mumbai's pop at like 12 million? Now, fast forward to 2011, and boom, it's crossed 18.4 million! Crazy, right? And Delhi NCR went from approx. 16 mil to over 21 mil in the same period. I heard some experts predict by '31, it'll be touching 30 million. Where will everyone stay, bhai?
normalised: Arrey yaar, remember back in two thousand and one when the census showed Mumbai's population at like twelve million? Now, fast forward to two thousand and eleven, and boom, it's crossed eighteen point four million! Crazy, right? And Delhi N-C-R went from approximately sixteen million to over twenty one million in the same period. I heard some experts predict by two thousand and thirty one, it'll be touching thirty million. Where will everyone stay, bhai?
